links.title: Samsung Electronics Profit Growth Slows on Smartphone Weakness
links.description: SEOUL - South Korean tech giant Samsung Electronics Co Ltd estimated on Friday earnings grew at the slowest pace in more than a year in the second quarter, as analysts said weak smartphone sales likely offset record high chip earnings.

links.title: China issues U.S. travel warnings amid escalating trade tensions
links.description: 중국, 미국과의 무역갈등 속 미국여행 경고령...물고 물리는 관세보복? Washington and Beijing.,.... are firing back and forth in different ways. China issued a U.S. travel warning last week.... and the American government moved to block China Mobile from offering services in the country. Our Ko Roon-hee has the latest on the growing trade tensions between the two giants.

messages.body: What to do on the eve of Trump's trade war: http://crackedmarket.com/2018/07/what-to-do-on-the-eve-of-trumps-trade-war/ $SPY $SPX $ES_F $QQQ $IWM $AAPL $AMZN $FB

links.title: What to do on the eve of Trump's trade war
links.description: Free After-Hours Update: On Thursday the S&P500 closed higher, erasing Tuesday's pre-holiday slump. Trump's trade war continues to dominate headlines, but to the great frustration of bears, these negative stories have been unable to dent this market. Are we on the verge of collapsing as bears claim, or do they have this all wrong?
